Suezo's Recipe's
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Recipes: Suezo's Recipe's
By Suezo183 on Saturday, September 2, 2000 - 11:11 pm:

Here is a really nice combonation of troops I use I call this deck "powerforce" the name says it all I will list all cards i have in deck below

1: Golem

2: Dino

3: Zilla
Skill cards:

Golem Skill Cards: 2Clutches, 3BrowHits, 1ThrowAway, 1Chop, 1W Chop, 1Roller, 1Cyclone, 1quake, 1Recharge, 1Defense, 1Protect

Dino Skill Cards: 1Punch, 1Charge, 1TailSlap, 2Bite, 1KneeKick, 2FireDash, 1DustKick, 3LeapKicks (VERY IMPORTANT), 3Endures, 2LeapAsides

Zilla Skill Cards: 1Scratch, 2BellyAttacks, 2TailLashes, 1BodyPress, 2RollAssaults, 3NeverMinds, 3Bounce(SO IMPORTANT WINS BATTLES FOR ME ALL THE TIME)!!!

Any Monster Skill Cards: 2Criticals thats all Good too use with cyclone combo to deal massive damage too all!!!

Breeder: 3Helps, LOL j/k =) 3NiceFights these stop the defense people from taking your guts away 99% of the time =P

Thats all I have I tried too make it as easy too understand as possible feel free to share your oppinions and if you found any way too make this deck better please tell me =) also I just wanna state it may look easy but the key behind the deck is keeping dino long enough too use his fire dash and leap attack combonation too kill any guy cuz it prevents them from dodging. In most cases dino gets hit 1st by comps so when dino goes try too take as many damage out of them as possible b4 golem dies then just sit back with bounce and let them kill themselves I quote "never get rid of bounce even if it slows down your gut production unless the person you are playing against is a defense person" Well Good luck with the deck I hope you enjoy it I know I do!!
